Documents: http://devel-m6w6.rhcloud.com/mdref/pq
Highlights: * Nearly complete support for asynchronous usage: http://devel-m6w6.rhcloud.com/mdref/pq/Connection/%3A%20Asynchronous%20Usage * Extended type support by pg_type: http:/devel-m6w6.rhcloud.com/mdref/pq/Types/%3A%20Overview * Fetching simple multi-dimensional array maps: http:/devel-m6w6.rhcloud.com/mdref/pq/Result/map * Working Gateway implementation: https://http://devel-m6w6.rhcloud.com/mdref/pq-gateway
